values.label: Domestic
values.comment: Domestic message as defined by relevant central bank.

values.label: Domestic with regulatory information required
values.comment: Domestic message with requirement to regulatory information to central bank.

values.label: Economic area
values.comment: Message crossing at least one national boundary but confined within a specific economic area (e.g. EC, EFTA ...).

values.label: International
values.comment: International message as defined by relevant central bank.

values.label: International with regulatory information required
values.comment: International message with requirement to regulatory information to central bank.

values.label: European Union
values.comment: To identify the message as originating from and destined to a member state of the European Union.

values.label: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) ID A
values.comment: SEPA message following EBA (EURO Banking Association) scheme 1, i.e. used for SEPA Credit Transfers / SEPA Direct Debits.

values.label: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) ID B
values.comment: SEPA message following scheme 2 as defined by EBA (EURO Banking Association).

values.label: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) ID C
values.comment: SEPA message following scheme 3 as defined by EBA (EURO Banking Association).

values.label: SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area) ID D
values.comment: SEPA message following scheme 4 as defined by EBA (EURO Banking Association).
